Oak_Lawn.Academy of Our Lady (Chicago):
Academy of Our Lady, also known as Longwood Academy, was a school in the Chicago, Illinois from 1875 to 1999. It was co-ed until 1892, and a girls' school afterwards; took boarding students until 1935; and had a grade school program until 1950, after which it was only a high school.
It opened as Academy of Our Lady of the Sacred Heart in 1875.
